item.title: Hundreds of Google AI Workers Were Fired Amid Fight Over Working Conditions
item.description: Over 200 contractors who work on improving Google’s AI products, including Gemini and AI Overviews, have been laid off, sources say. It’s the latest development in a conflict over pay and alleged poor
